mapper.sql: id, user_id, topic_id, content, vote, insert_time
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS comment_id, c.user_id, c.topic_id, c.content, c.vote, c.insert_time, cv.my_comment_vote, dcv.disagree_vote_count, acv.agree_vote_count FROM comment c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT vote AS my_comment_vote, comment_id FROM comment_vote WHERE user_id = #{myUserId}) cv ON cv.comment_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comment_id, COUNT(*) AS disagree_vote_count FROM comment_vote WHERE vote = -1 GROUP BY comment_id) dcv ON dcv.comment_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comment_id, COUNT(*) AS agree_vote_count FROM comment_vote WHERE vote = 1 GROUP BY comment_id) acv ON acv.comment_id = c.id WHERE topic_id = #{topicId} ORDER BY insert_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (user_id, topic_id, content, vote) VALUE (#{userId}, #{topicId}, #{content}, #{vote})
